item.title: Select and Speak
item.author: joe.v.iacoviello@gmail.com (Joseph Iacoviello)
item.description: Goal The goal of this project was to create a Chrome Extension that people could use to hear their webpages instead of just reading them. Implementation The app uses the iSpeech api to stream audio generated from the text. Completed The app accomplishes the stated goals and is being maintained. My contribution The app was written when I joined the team, I was responsible for adding new features and maintaining it through it’s lifecycle.
